features: CLEAN WITH EASE: The Powerstone's Pumice Dustpan & Brush is your reliable cleaning partner! Sturdy & versatile, it's excellent for sweeping up dust or debris in homes, offices, & RVs. The soft rubber lip adjusts to any surface. Clip the brush, and store it compactly! Upgrade your tidying experience!

SMALL ON SIZE BUT BIG ON DIRT: The combo set is built to last, measuring 8" tall and 6" wide, it's the excellent size for tackling any mess, big or small. Equipped with soft bristles and a sturdy dustpan, this duo makes cleaning effortless and convenient.

SMALL SPACE? NO PROBLEM: With its compact size, it can reach even the smallest of spaces in your home, office, or anywhere else. Whether you're cleaning up a big mess or tackling small spaces, it's an excellent solution for a trouble-free cleaning experience.

CONVENIENT FOR ANYONE AT HOME: These cleaning tools make an effective and kid-friendly tool that anyone can use which makes cleaning a breeze. The compact size makes it easy to handle, even for kids. It's ideal for quick cleanups or tackling tough messes.

AN IDEAL GIFT FOR THE TIDY-MINDED: Looking for a thoughtful gift for someone who loves to clean and tidy up their home? Look no further than the Powerstone Dustpan & Brush Combo Set. With its dirt-removing potency, it's an excellent gift for anyone who takes pride in their home.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Green Cleaning Products That Really Work Pumice Stones & Other Housekeeping Essentials Powerstone Pumice means better cleaning that’s better for the planet. Our hard-working pumice stones remove tough stains without chemicals, or residue, for a delightfully fresh bathroom and perfect peace of mind. Count on Powerstone Pumice to get the job done.

FOR BATHROOMS & BEYOND No Chemicals Count on Powerstone for cleaning products that are safe for the environment. Safe for Surfaces Use our pumice stones to remove stains from tile, tub, sink, toilet, BBQ, and tools. Sturdy Bristles Our kitchen brushes come in various sizes and will not scratch your cookware. Brooms & Dustpans Stash a broom-and-dustpan set in your garage, basement, RV, anywhere you need a clean sweep.

Fine-Grit Pumice Won’t Scratch Your Surfaces Powerful Cleaning Without Chemicals Powerstone Pumice stones are dense and long-lasting. They leave behind no residue and are safe for use on your toilet bowls, sinks, tubs, tile, and other porcelain/ceramic surfaces. They’re also tough enough to remove baked-on food from BBQ grills, dirt from gardening tools, and even rust from the tools in your workshop.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 18, 2017
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Small, durable, and very pretty!
reviews.reviewText: What can you say about a little dust pan? Not much except I will say this is a good qualtiy one. The brush handle is thick but rounded so it's easy and comfortable to grasp. The bristles on the brush are firm and there's enough of them to make this very effectve at sweeping every tiny bits of debris. I bought this because I was wasting rolls of paper towels cleaning up after my cats ate their wet food. I don't know how they can spew wet cat food particles so far from their dishes, but they do. What I like about this brush is that it sweeps up even the wet cat food pieces and I can easily rinse the brush off in the sink. I'll also say that the pink color is really pretty and vibrant so if someone is looking for a mini dustpan that's bright and bold in color, this is a good choice. It's small enough to easily store under my sink and out of the way. I'm going to buy another one for my sister who is always complaining that there is kibble all over the floor where her dogs eat.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 1, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for Young Child/Toddler
reviews.reviewText: We got my 16 month old this mini dust pan and broom for Christmas cause he has been wanting to "help" clean. He absolutely LOVES it & goes around sweeping everything--including the cat (who actually likes it because of the bristles). It is very sturdy & has withheld a toddler smashing it into the floor repeatedly without thr bristles loosing shape. It fits well in his little hands, but I was able to use it myself (an adult woman) without issues either. It would work well for little messes or crumbs as well as smaller spaces. I would highly recommend this if looking for a child friendly sized dust pan & broom (of course with adult supervision) but already this product has brought so much joy & laughter to my child's life. Apparently this will be our new go to gift for toddlers & young kids in our lives.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 4, 2018
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Small and effective
reviews.reviewText: This does the job intended: cleaning up coffee grinds. IT's the right size for my needs. The rubbery edge of the pan sits flat to the surface of whatever I'm trying to clean. The brush is short and firm enough to gather all the mess. The only reason I knocked a star was because of the material on the brush handle. It's a nice rubbery material that makes the grip secure and, perhaps, comfortable; however, a lot of coffee grind sediment sticks to it. I haven't yet found a hook that will work for hanging it as the handle is quite thick.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 10, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Just what I was looking for.
reviews.reviewText: Perfect for small clean-ups. Rubber edge makes sure you sweep up every bit. Cute and well made.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 15, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cute and functional
reviews.reviewText: Since I can never find the dustpan, I keep several around. This fits on a tiny stick on hook on the inside of the kitchen sink cabinet and one for the bathroom. Buy several nd save running around.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 4, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect for travel!
reviews.reviewText: It's perfect size for my travel Nail Tower. I get so much dust all over and I won't just swipe it on someone's floor in their home, so I use this yo gather it all up off my table and whatever else. EASY fast clean up for me!

reviews.reviewText: Works perfect - sweeps small spaces well
